text: Lolo Letalu Matalasi Moliga (born 1949) is an American Samoan politician, former educator, businessman, and former President of the Development Bank of American Samoa (DBAS) from 2009 to 2012. Moliga was a candidate for Governor of American Samoa in the 2012 election which he won. He left office in 2021. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American businesspeople Category:Governors of American Samoa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Lolo Matalasi Moliga
